snippet: Denmark, already a cycling nation, is trying to encourage commuting to Copenhagen by bicycle by opening what it calls cycle superhighways.
abstract: Copenhagen Journal; Denmark, already a cycling nation, is trying to encourage commuting to Copenhagen by bicycle by opening what it calls cycle superhighways.
lead_paragraph: Denmark, already a cycling nation, is trying to encourage commuting to Copenhagen by bicycle by opening what it calls cycle superhighways.

headline.seo: In Denmark, Pedaling to Work on a Superhighway
headline.main: Commuters Pedal to Work on Their Very Own Superhighway
headline.print_headline: Commuters Pedal to Work on Their Very Own Superhighway
